#LIVE: Presentation at the Cabinet meeting. https://t.co/qJFwWaHW4q
The return of the economy to growth rates obliges us to think and plan seriously and carefully the next day.
The stumbling block for tomorrow's economy is not played in the meeting of technical stadiums but in the field of the real economy.
The point is not to change the charts with more optimistic data, but the development path to be felt in society.
Our goal must be convergence with developed economies and improving our country's position in international division of labor.
Agenda of the main opposition and @kmitsotakis is the liberalization of redundancies, the abolition of protection at work 1/2
tax immunity to great wealth, the protection of the powerful against small and medium competition. 2/2
For us, prosperity is to reduce inequalities, fair redistribution of wealth, everyone's right to decent work, to a viable state
From today, an organized process is under way to shape the National Development Strategy in the coming years, with a horizon of 2021.
The most competitive economies are those who invest in knowledge, innovation, human capital, comparative advantages. 1/2
This is the direction in which we must turn, having in mind that the end result is reflected in society. 2/2
Today, the debate on the National Development Strategy begins. There will be a reasonable consultation time with productive 1/2
and social players at central level. Then there will be a similar process at regional level. 2/2
